byline.contributor: Maggie Haberman contributed reporting from New York, and Kitty Bennett contributed research.

abstract: Veterans groups defend Sen John McCain and denounce Republican presidential candidate Donald J Trump following Trump's criticism of McCain's war record; question why Trump would single out veterans’ issues and Vietnam as line of attack when his own record on issue is dicey and he avoided serving in Vietnam through medical deferment.
lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump faces a barrage of criticism himself over his own commitment to veterans causes as well as the propriety of attacking a former prisoner of war honored as a hero.

headline.main: Veterans’ Groups Take Their Shots at Donald Trump as He Backs Off a Bit on McCain
headline.print_headline: Veterans’ Groups Take Their Shots at Trump as He Backs Off a Bit on McCain

snippet: Donald J. Trump faces a barrage of criticism himself over his own commitment to veterans causes as well as the propriety of attacking a former prisoner of war honored as a hero.
